definitions.definition: The act or process of detecting , uncovering , or finding out , the discovery of something new , hidden , or disguised .
Synonym of accusation , the exposure of concealed information about a crime or heresy .
The act or process of finding or detecting an electrical signal in a carrier wave .

main_definition: The act or process of detecting , uncovering , or finding out , the discovery of something new , hidden , or disguised .
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) Synonym of accusation , the exposure of concealed information about a crime or heresy .
( electrical engineering ) The act or process of finding or detecting an electrical signal in a carrier wave .
